title: What Can We Expect From The PlayStation 5 Showcase? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.14.20
description:
It's time to speculate! Blessing and Tim talk about everything we can expect from Wednesday's PS5 showcase.

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:45 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO is getting kicked to Wednesday because we’re reacting live to the PlayStation 5 Showcase. Our post-show will be a special episode of PS I Love YOU XOXO, breaking down our thoughts on everything we just saw.
Thursday RTX Panels:
Kinda Funny Panel Noon Pacific Time
I (Blessing) am on a journalism panel at 3pm pacific time
You can catch those on roosterteeth.com
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Tom Bock,Mohammed Mohammed,& Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:32 - What can we expect from Wednesday’s PlayStation 5 showcase? - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:16:50 - Will PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale 2 be there? - Best Friends Q:Dapper Stephen with a PH
00:21:19 - Oculus Quest 2 has leaked! - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:24:58 - The Xbox Series S will play the Xbox One S versions of backward compatible titles - Rebekah Valentine @ GiBiz
00:32:11 - Borderlands 3 is getting a free PS5 and Xbox Series X upgrade with four-player splitscreen - Sean Hollister @ The Verge
00:34:52 - Nvidia acquires Arm for $40bn - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:39:30 -  NZXT 
00:41:47 -  Quip 
00:43:11 -  Upstart 
00:44:49 -  Door Dash 
00:46:15 - Kena Bridge of Spirits has been delayed to 2021 - Statement from Ember Lab on twitter
00:50:10 - ViacomCBS Reaches Deal to Sell CNET for $500 Million - Todd Springer @ Variety
00:53:12 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:54:19 - Why not go with Super Mario 64 DS for the Switch collection? - Charles Jakobsen
00:59:02 - Squad Up:Brian Smith(PS4)  - BSchmittah
00:59:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Imran
